<title level="1" pfs="">[Hymmir Urath](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2172)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Hymmir Urath](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2172)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 80
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, burrow 5 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +14 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 plus ghoul fever and paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d4+7 plus paralysis

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. **Effect** The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 3d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

**Ghoul Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 22; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a [ghoul](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=52) the next midnight.

**Hungry Rage** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** Hymmir damages a living creature with his jaws Strike; **Effect** The taste of flesh and blood throws Hymmir into a violent rage. He gains 9 temporary Hit Points, deals an additional 2 damage with melee Strikes, and takes a –1 penalty to AC for 1 minute.

**Gnaw and Chew** <actions string="Three Actions" />  **Requirements** Hymmir is in a hungry rage; **Effect** Hymmir attempts a jaws Strike. If he hits, he chews at his target and inflicts an additional 1d6 slashing damage. Hymmir regains 3d6 Hit Points.

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Any living, non-[elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

**Swift Leap** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The ghoul jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>
name: Hymmir Urath

Effect The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 3d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once. Ghoul Fever (Disease) Saving Throw Fortitude DC 22; Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day); Stage 2 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day); Stage 4 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day); Stage 6 dead, and rises as a ghoul the next midnight. Hungry Rage Reaction (Concentrate, Emotion, Mental) Trigger Hymmir damages a living creature with his jaws Strike; Effect The taste of flesh and blood throws Hymmir into a violent rage. He gains 9 temporary Hit Points, deals an additional 2 damage with melee Strikes, and takes a –1 penalty to AC for 1 minute. Gnaw and Chew Three Actions Requirements Hymmir is in a hungry rage; Effect Hymmir attempts a jaws Strike. If he hits, he chews at his target and inflicts an additional 1d6 slashing damage. Hymmir regains 3d6 Hit Points. Paralysis (Incapacitation, Necromancy, Occult) Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or become paralyzed. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save. Swift Leap Single Action (Move) The ghoul jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
